>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","minLength":1,"maxLength":100,"description":"User full name","example":"Jane Smith Updated"},"email":{"type":"string","format":"email","description":"User email address","example":"updated@example.com"},"role":{"type":"string","enum":["admin","user","viewer"],"description":"User role","example":"admin"},"is_active":{"type":"boolean","description":"Account active status","example":true}},"title":"UpdateUserRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
